entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Sussex
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:47 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sussex Four Corners 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 64 %
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: NE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of ice pellets or freezing rain early this morning. Freezing rain beginning this morning then changing to ice pellets this afternoon. Ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to snow and ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 10 except minus 14 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 10 except minus 14 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
